title: Premiere: Graveyard Club – Diamond City
content:
Photo: Chelsea Rice

Minneapolis quartet Graveyard Club write the sort of upbeat yet slightly ominous synth-pop that New Order pioneered back in the 80’s; anthemic, emotive and somehow exceedingly danceable.

Their latest track, Diamond City, lifted from Cellar Door, their sophomore record out later in the year, is insanely addictive and absolutely perfect for those summer playlists. Full of energy and character, it suggests a very exciting LP may well be on the way. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
